entry.source: This is Hope. A demon has appeared in the{F801}city, near the shopping district. It has{F801}been seen on the street near the bakery.{F801}Dispose of it quietly, before the public{F801}finds out. Anyone confident in their skill,{F801}go there and watch for it. That is all.{F801}
